body_text:
Comedy manga with a 16 year old boy from a poor family It starts with a boy (about 16 years old) who is extremely strong and works a lot because his family is poor. However, his family has one piece of land which everybody seems to want, from people in the future to space pirates, to everyone really.
It was a brilliantly funny manga, and I would be really glad if anyone could help me.

A comedy manga about a guy who protects his house from a girl that comes from the future The manga is about a guy who protects his house from a girl that came from the future on a tree. There are also other people after his house. It was a comedy manga.
Edit
The girl from the future does all she can to steal his house. There also were demons after his house. The guy attended school and is really strong. There also was a part where the girl went outside of the manga, dragged a guy out of train, and makes him fight the main character.
In another episode a giant eye appeared in the sky. They then used pepper on it to make it leave. At the end of the manga, the main character is moved from his own manga to another manga in a desert.
